analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

translated: .. The wholesome triad, the result triad

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.🔽Naakusalaṁ navipākaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka  na akusalam na vipākam dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ vipākaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā eka
translated: With a wholesome, not a result, as condition, an unwholesome, result, consciousness arises, by way of root condition. … (One) …🔽With a unwholesome, not a result, as condition, an unwholesome, result, consciousness arises, by way of root condition. … (One) …

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākañca naakusalaṁ navipākañca dhammaṁ paṭicca abyākato vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na kusalam na vipākam ca na akusalam na vipākam ca dhammam paṭicca abyākataḥ vipākaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: With a wholesome, not a result, and a unwholesome, not a result, as condition, an unwholesome, result, consciousness arises, by way of root condition. … (Abbreviated.)

original: Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi  na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paccayā kusalaḥ vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: (The rest of the method is to be expanded in detail as in the Triad.)🔽With a wholesome, not a result, as condition, a wholesome, not a result, consciousness arises, by way of root condition.

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na kusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ vipāka dhamma dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā dve
translated: With a wholesome, not a result, as condition, an unwholesome, not a result, consciousness arises, by way of root condition. … (Two) …

original: Naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammaṁ paccayā akusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve.
analyzed: na akusalam na vipāka dhamma dhammam paccayā akusalaḥ vipāka dhamma dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā dve
translated: With non-causally-originated unprofitable consciousness as condition, causally-originated unprofitable consciousness arises, by way of root-cause condition … two.🔽With non-causally-originated unprofitable consciousness and non-causally-originated unprofitable consciousness as condition, causally-originated profitable consciousness arises, by way of root-cause condition … two. (Condensed.)🔽With root-cause as condition, six … With non-causally-originated unprofitable consciousness as condition, causally-originated profitable consciousness arises, by way of root-cause condition. (Condensed.)

original: Nakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca naakusalaṁ navipākadhammadhammañca dhammaṁ paccayā kusalo vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)🔽Hetuyā cha …pe… avigate cha.
